attributes.action: Instruct the rail companies to bring out a National Rail season ticket which for a set price gives unlimited travel anywhere in the UK .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe Germany and Switzerland's railways offer an annual railpass which covers the entire country on train and bus.
If introduced here -at least for trains- i am convinced many people would give up motoring and thus reduce emissions.
